titles.title: A resolution to amend the Standing Rules of the Senate to prohibit a Member, officer, or employee of the Senate from disclosing or using any material nonpublic information learned during the course of his or her service for personal gain.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Rules and Administration.

term.name: Government ethics and transparency, public corruption

bill.summary: 11/30/2011--Introduced. Amends Rule XXXVII (Conflict of Interest) of the Standing Rules of the Senate to prohibit a Member, officer, or employee of the Senate from disclosing or using any material nonpublic information learned during the course of his or her service for personal gain.
